A tennis ball can be used as a bouncing ball for children, encouraging physical activity and hand-eye coordination.
A tennis ball can be used as a stress ball, by squishing it to relieve tension in the hands.
A tennis ball can be used as a ball, a device that holds multiple balls together for easy storage and transportation.
